title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 97.2 - Land requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 97.2 - Land requirements

State Regulations
(a) A
crop of winter grain will not be eligible for certification if planted on land
on which any winter grain was grown the previous year. (b) A crop of spring grain may be grown where
the previous crop was of the same or higher certification class of the same
variety. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
97.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
